event.name: Tech Conference 2024
event.basic_rules: All participants must register online in advance. No on-site registration allowed.
event.description: Join industry leaders and innovators for a three-day tech conference featuring workshops, keynote speakers, and networking opportunities.

event.name: Art Expo 2024
event.basic_rules: Masks required. No food or drinks allowed inside the gallery.
event.description: An immersive art exhibition showcasing modern and contemporary artists from around the world.

event.name: Health & Wellness Summit 2024
event.basic_rules: Pre-event health screening is mandatory for all participants.
event.description: A two-day summit dedicated to health and wellness, featuring talks, workshops, and fitness sessions.

event.name: Innovation Hackathon 2024
event.basic_rules: Teams must consist of 3-5 members. Code of conduct must be followed throughout the event.
event.description: A 48-hour coding competition where developers, designers, and entrepreneurs collaborate to create innovative solutions.

event.name: Global Startup Pitch 2024
event.basic_rules: Pitch presentations must be no longer than 10 minutes. No more than 2 team members may present.
event.description: An exciting event where startup founders pitch their innovative ideas to a panel of investors and entrepreneurs.
